overview: Police inspector Kal H:son Lund is at the peak of his career, when a slip causes everything to collapse. In a hot meeting with a prostitute, he is literally caught with his pants down by his own colleagues. In order to keep the job, he is forced to undergo a two-stage sex therapy treatment…
tagline: If he had known where his desires would take him, he would have thought of…
title: Bekännelser
